title: Build Apple-inspired minimal e-commerce website

requirements.text: Create Landing Page with Hero Section featuring large product hero image, headline 'Designed For The Future.', subtext 'Precision. Performance. Perfection.', Shop Now button, Learn More button, and smooth scroll animation

quotes: Hero Section: Large product hero image (premium 3D render or studio product shot)
Big bold headline: "Designed For The Future."
Two buttons: • Shop Now • Learn More

acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays large product image
Headline and subtext are prominently displayed
Both Shop Now and Learn More buttons are functional and styled
Smooth scroll animation triggers on page load or scroll

requirements.text: Add Featured Products section below hero with 3-4 large product cards displaying product images, names, and prices
acceptanceCriteria: 3-4 product cards are displayed in a clean grid
Each card shows product image, name, and price
Cards have hover effects consistent with Apple design

requirements.text: Add Why Choose Us section with 3 minimal icons and short descriptive text for each benefit

quotes: Why Choose Us (3 minimal icons with short text)

acceptanceCriteria: Three benefit items are displayed with icons
Each item has short, clear text
Icons are minimal and consistent with Apple aesthetic

requirements.text: Add Product Showcase section with large left-right layout alternating product images and descriptions

quotes: Product Showcase (large left-right layout with big images)

acceptanceCriteria: Large images alternate between left and right sides
Product descriptions complement each image
Layout feels spacious and premium

requirements.text: Add Customer Reviews section with minimal review cards displaying customer feedback
acceptanceCriteria: Review cards display customer quotes
Cards are minimal and clean
Reviews are easy to read

requirements.text: Add Newsletter Signup section with email input and subscribe button
acceptanceCriteria: Email input field is clearly visible
Subscribe button is prominently placed
Section follows minimal design principles

requirements.text: Add Clean Footer with navigation links, social media icons, and policy links
acceptanceCriteria: Footer contains organized navigation links
Social media icons are present and styled
Policy links (Privacy, Terms) are included
Footer design is minimal and clean

requirements.text: Create Product Listing Page with 4-column grid layout on desktop and 2-column on mobile, displaying product cards with images, names, prices, Add to Cart button, and wishlist heart icon
acceptanceCriteria: Desktop displays 4 columns of products
Mobile displays 2 columns of products
Each product card shows image, name, price, Add to Cart button, and wishlist icon
Grid is perfectly aligned

requirements.text: Add Filters sidebar to Product Listing Page with Price, Category, and Rating filter options
acceptanceCriteria: Sidebar contains Price, Category, and Rating filters
Filters are functional and update product display
Sidebar is collapsible on mobile

requirements.text: Add Sort dropdown to Product Listing Page with sorting options for products
acceptanceCriteria: Dropdown includes multiple sort options
Sorting updates product order
Dropdown is styled consistently with Apple design

requirements.text: Implement hover product image zoom effect on Product Listing Page cards
acceptanceCriteria: Product images smoothly zoom on hover
Zoom effect is subtle and smooth
Effect works consistently across all product cards

requirements.text: Create Product Detail Page with large left-side product gallery supporting multiple images
acceptanceCriteria: Gallery displays multiple product images
Main image is large and prominent on the left
Thumbnail images allow switching between views
Gallery is responsive

requirements.text: Add right-side product information panel to Product Detail Page with product name, price, short description, size/color selectors, quantity selector, Add to Cart button, and Buy Now button

quotes: Right side: Product name Price Short description Size/Color selectors Quantity selector Add to Cart button Buy Now button

acceptanceCriteria: Product name and price are clearly displayed
Description is concise and readable
Size and color selectors are functional
Quantity can be adjusted
Both action buttons are prominent and functional

requirements.text: Add tabbed product details section below product info on Product Detail Page with Description, Specs, and Reviews tabs
acceptanceCriteria: Three tabs are visible: Description, Specs, Reviews
Tab switching is smooth and functional
Each tab displays relevant content
Tab design is minimal and clean

requirements.text: Create Cart Page with product list showing images, quantity controls, remove option, and price summary displaying subtotal, shipping, total, and checkout button

quotes: Product list with image Quantity control Remove option Price summary Subtotal Shipping Total Checkout button

acceptanceCriteria: Each cart item displays product image and details
Quantity can be adjusted per item
Items can be removed from cart
Price summary shows subtotal, shipping, and total
Checkout button is prominent

requirements.text: Create Checkout Page UI with shipping address form, contact info section, payment method selection (Card/UPI/PayPal UI mock), order summary panel, and Place Order button with secure, trustworthy design

quotes: Shipping address form Contact info Payment method selection (Card / UPI / PayPal UI mock) Order summary panel Place Order button
Design must look secure and trustworthy.

acceptanceCriteria: Shipping form collects all necessary address fields
Contact info section is clear
Payment method options are displayed (UI only)
Order summary shows items and totals
Place Order button is prominent and trustworthy
Overall design conveys security

requirements.text: Create Login Page with minimal center card containing email input, password input, remember me checkbox, and forgot password link

quotes: Login Page: Minimal center card Email + Password Remember me Forgot password

acceptanceCriteria: Login form is centered in a minimal card
Email and password fields are present
Remember me checkbox is functional
Forgot password link is visible
Design is clean and minimal

requirements.text: Create Register Page with minimal center card containing full name, email, password, and confirm password fields

quotes: Register Page: Full name Email Password Confirm password

acceptanceCriteria: Registration form is centered in a minimal card
All four fields are present and functional
Password confirmation validation works
Design matches login page aesthetic

requirements.text: Create Account Dashboard with sidebar navigation (Profile, Orders, Wishlist, Settings, Logout) and main panel displaying order history cards, account details editing, and saved addresses

quotes: Sidebar: Profile Orders Wishlist Settings Logout
Main panel: Order history cards Account details editing Saved addresses

acceptanceCriteria: Sidebar contains all five navigation items
Main panel switches content based on sidebar selection
Order history displays as cards
Account details can be edited
Saved addresses are manageable
Dashboard is clean and organized

requirements.text: Implement mobile-specific optimizations: collapsible navbar, bottom sticky add-to-cart on product page, larger touch-friendly buttons, clean spacing, and optimized layouts (not scaled desktop)

quotes: Bottom sticky add-to-cart on product page

acceptanceCriteria: Mobile navbar collapses into hamburger menu
Product detail page has sticky add-to-cart at bottom on mobile
All buttons are larger and touch-friendly on mobile
Mobile layouts are optimized, not just scaled
Spacing is generous on mobile
No elements feel cramped

requirements.text: Apply Apple-inspired design system: clean white and soft gray base colors, Inter or SF Pro style typography, maximum 2-3 colors, large spacing, rounded corners, soft shadows, smooth subtle animations, perfect grid alignment, lots of white space, no heavy gradients, no dark neon effects, no clutter, no loud colors

quotes: Clean white and soft gray base
Use Inter or SF Pro style typography

acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses white and soft gray as base
Typography uses Inter or SF Pro font family
Maximum of 2-3 colors used throughout
Generous spacing between all elements
All corners are rounded consistently
Shadows are soft and subtle
Grid alignment is perfect across all layouts
Animations are smooth and subtle
Design feels spacious with ample white space
No gradients, neon effects, or loud colors present

requirements.text: Ensure full responsive design with separate optimized layouts for desktop and mobile (not just scaled down), maintaining premium feel across all breakpoints

quotes: The website must be fully responsive.
Desktop and mobile must have separate optimized layouts (not just scaled down).

acceptanceCriteria: All pages are fully responsive
Desktop layouts are optimized for large screens
Mobile layouts are uniquely designed, not scaled
Tablet breakpoints are handled appropriately
Premium feel is maintained on all devices

requirements.text: Implement smooth hover effects and scroll animations throughout the site to create fluid, premium interactions
acceptanceCriteria: All interactive elements have smooth hover effects
Scroll animations are subtle and enhance experience
Animations feel natural and not distracting
Performance remains smooth with animations enabled

requirements.text: Organize code with clean structure and well-organized components following React best practices
acceptanceCriteria: Components are properly separated and reusable
File structure is logical and maintainable
Code follows React best practices
Component naming is clear and consistent

constraints: Desktop and mobile must have separate optimized layouts (not scaled)
Must feel like a billion-dollar brand store with human-made feel (NOT generic AI template)
